official.headline: Public Tribunal Announced
official.anchor_line: Council agrees to conduct a public tribunal on the BCI system and Stenograd’s governance history.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent dialogue demonstrates Stenograd’s commitment to continuous improvement and public confidence.

official.headline: Unified Testimony Day
official.anchor_line: Key BCI architects address citizen forums, sharing historical context and system advancements.
official.contextual_reframing: Open testimony reinforces the city’s dedication to reasoned progress and evidence-led stewardship.

official.headline: Civic Reforms Initiated
official.anchor_line: Districts begin forming civic councils while BCI enforcement is reviewed for future optimization.
official.contextual_reframing: Guided adaptation ensures local voices and strengthens unity across Stenograd’s infrastructure-driven society.

underground.headline: Council Forced Into Light
underground.anchor_line: Public fury cracks the Council’s silence—tribunal on BCI secrets now unavoidable.
underground.contextual_reframing: They called it ‘dialogue,’ but the people made it a reckoning. Watch for what they don’t say.

underground.headline: Whistleblowers Speak Out
underground.anchor_line: BCI insiders expose hidden manipulation and coverups at the tribunal—crowds erupt in outrage.
underground.contextual_reframing: Off-script testimony, real risks. Stories of lost jobs, blacklists, and rewired destinies hit the air.

underground.headline: BCI Power Melts Down
underground.anchor_line: Districts deform the system—no more blind scoring, new civic councils rise up across the city.
underground.contextual_reframing: Enforcement weakens. The Directorate scrambles. For the first time, real choices crack through the algorithm.
